tradeCredits1.description: Contains 1 Trade Credit. Use it to trade pins with other users.

tradeCredits2.description: Contains 3 Trade Credits. Use these to trade pins with other users.

tradeCredits3.description: Contains 5 Trade Credits. Use these to trade pins with other users.

tradeCredits4.description: Contains 10 Trade Credits. Use these to trade pins with other users.

tradeCredits5.description: Contains 25 Trade Credits. Use these to trade pins with other users.

brawler.description: Randomly selects a new brawler to unlock. If all brawlers of a specific rarity are unlocked, the probability of getting a brawler of all other rarities increases.
